title: Grilled asparagus soup
ingredients: ['700g asparagus spears, trimmed', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 large onion, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '1L vegetable or chicken stock', '400ml water', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh chives', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh lemon thyme', '1 pot creme fraiche, to garnish']
